project_descr: Appropriate Mitigation Actions in the Energy Generation and End-use Sector in Sri Lanka

outputs.output_descr: The expected outcome of this component is the regular update of renewable energy utilization baseline & energy intensity reference baselines for the energy generation and end-use sectors.
